name: Idlelator
description:
This project was imported from Scratch

This game is made by me

Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/559667931

----------

Your name is Flint in this game

-- Controls -- 

Press "T" to open achievement list

Press "Y" to open stats list

Press "P" to change the volume of the song

Use your mouse to interact and look up/down

Best experience in full screen

-- What you can do --

Turn on/off the fan

Look up/down

Play with the fidget spinner

Use the intractable computer

Use the intractable phone

many more...

----------

Version 1.1

More updates coming soon, (more apps and or features)

-- Temperature unit --

Log in to the computer (if you know the password) and change it in the settings! (°C, °F, °K) I know the accurate temperature for only °C, so I used Google for the other units! Sorry if it's not accurate.
